title: Breakfast Sausage Spinach Pie
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 F. In medium skillet over medium heat, crumble and brown sausage until cooked. Place into pie shell, and top with Swiss cheese and spinach. In bowl, combine eggs, half and half, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Pour over sausage mixture. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until a knife inserted into center comes out clean. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
